title: Water Cycle and Energy Flow
description: An illustration depicting the water cycle and energy flow in a mountainous landscape. The sun is shown emitting yellow rays, indicating solar energy. Arrows in red represent the movement of water vapor and clouds, while steam rises from buildings and power plants, suggesting human activity and energy production. The scene includes a lake, forests, and mountains, illustrating the interaction between natural and human-made environments.

title: Urban Heat Island Effect
description: An illustration depicting the urban heat island effect, showing a cityscape with various buildings. The image features arrows indicating the sun's rays and heat rising from the buildings, along with wavy lines representing heat emissions. The background includes a layer of clouds, suggesting a temperature difference between the urban area and the surrounding environment.

title: Pollution and Rain Formation
description: An illustration depicting a factory emitting smoke from its chimneys. The smoke rises into the atmosphere, where it contributes to cloud formation. The clouds are shown releasing rain over a green landscape with trees and a pond, illustrating the impact of industrial pollution on weather patterns.
